global.title: Global Steam data statistic analysis -- SteamHub
global.description: SteamHub is a global data statistic community for Steam that provides real-time prices and information for developers and gamers every day.

game.title: Steam Apps -- SteamHub
game.description: SteamHub provides developers with first-hand Steam app data.

info.description: Query data using AppID: {AppID} -- {title} in SteamHub

search.title: SteamHub Search -- SteamHub Search
search.description: SteamHub Search offers a wealth of search options for deep mining by developers and users worldwide.

q.title: Search for data about {q} apps  -- SteamHub Search
q.description: Search and use app data information about {q} in SteamHub Search

carousel.title: red dead redemption 2
carousel.description: An epic tale of life in America at the dawn of the modern age - Most looking forward to the year
carousel.star: America, 1899. After a robbery goes wrong in the town of Blackwater, Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are forced to flee. With federal agents and bounty hunters massing on their heels, the gang must rob, steal and fight their way across America to survive. As deepening internal divisions threaten to tear the gang apart, Arthur must choose between his own ideals and loyalty to the gang who raised him.

tab.title: Shadow of the Tomb Raider
tab.description: Laura Crawford rushed all the way to save the world from the scourge of the Mayan prophecy. She will finally meet her destiny and grow into a destined tomb.
tab.star: IGN Rating: 9/10 The 'Tomb Raider Shadow' provides a powerful final chapter for Laura Crouch's trilogy of origin.

tab.title: Cities: Skylines
tab.description: Design, build and manage your city of dreams, from public service to citizenship policy, challenge yourself, from simple towns to bustling downtown.
tab.star: IGN Rating: 8.5/10 There is only one theme for 'City: Skyline', which is to build a huge, awkward city without the need to face various massacre disasters.

SteamHub is a data exchange platform for: SteamHub is a data exchange platform for games and creative communities
